## buildSnapshot() function

Builds an immutable snapshot of the current list state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
buildSnapshot: <TRow = any, TRowId extends RowId = RowId>(state: ListState<TRow>) => ListSnapshot<TRow, TRowId>
```
